item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} CriticalAlertCount
item_prototype.description: Number of active performance alerts, critical severity

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} HostIOs
item_prototype.description: The number of host operations performed each second by the group.

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} HostMBs
item_prototype.description: Cumulative number of host MBs read/writes per second by the group

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} PercentHit
item_prototype.description: The percent of IO operations that were immediately satisfied from cache.

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} RDFS_WriteResponseTime
item_prototype.description: A summary of the read, write, and average response times for the selected SRDF/S group.

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} Read Response Time
item_prototype.description: The average time that it took the Symmetrix to serve one read IO for this group.

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} WarningAlertCount
item_prototype.description: Number of active performance alerts, warning severity

item_prototype.name: Storage Group {#NAME} Write Response Time
item_prototype.description: The average time that it took the Symmetrix to serve one write IO for this group.
